医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
角膜损伤的干细胞疗法在临床试验中表现出显着的结果一项扩展的临床试验测试了针对盲角膜损伤的开创性，实验性干细胞治疗，发现该治疗是可行的，可在14例接受治疗并遵循18个月的患者中安全，并且完全或部分成功。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/stem-cell-therapy-for-cornea-injuries-dresn-d-d-d-d-d-d-d--------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/stem-cell-therapy-for-cornea-injuries-dresn--d-d-d-d-d-d-d-d---------------comment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d8A234A-CD3E-480D-9729-CF0AB5B5B0B5DC Tue, 04 Mar 2025 07:02:31 -0500 Stem cell therapy for cornea injuries demonstrates remarkable results in clinical trial
靶向线粒体DNA完整性以进行受伤后心脏保护维持线粒体DNA（mtDNA）完整性对于心肌细胞功能至关重要，其破坏在缺血/再灌注（I/R）损伤中起着重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/targeting-mitochondrial-dna-integrity-for-cardiac-cardiac-cardiac-protection-fortection-after-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/targeting-mitochondrial-dna-integrity-for-for-cardiac-cardiac-cardiac-protection-after-after-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A43C462E-2718-4AD2-AAF1-7EE640F46746 Tue, 04 Mar 2025 06:55:45 -0500 Targeting mitochondrial DNA integrity for cardiac protection after injury
新工具彻底改变了传染病检测的底漆设计张Liye实验室的研究人员开发了一种开创性的工具，该工具彻底改变了研究人员设计用于检测病原体的底漆的方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/new-tool-revolutions-primer-design-for-inforious-infectious-disease-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/new-tool-revolutions-primer-design-for-inforious-infectious-disease-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6e95EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE-BB37-4DF8-BA5DD-F029DDD58F5D1 Tue, 04 Mar 2025 06:30:15 -0500 New tool revolutionizes primer design for infectious disease detection
α粒子疗法为神经内分泌肿瘤提供了新的希望在全面的基因组新闻观点（评论）文章中，研究人员对应对神经内分泌肿瘤（NETS）的革命方法（一种罕见但越来越普遍的癌症形式）的关注点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/alpha-particle-therapy-offers-new-hope-for-neuroendocrine-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/alpha-particle-therapy-offers-new-hope-for-neuroendocrine-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9d314b3-7291-4943-bf0c-70a378381938 Tue, 04 Mar 2025 06:23:05 -0500 Alpha particle therapy offers new hope for neuroendocrine tumors
研究提供了有关大脑如何区分疼痛和瘙痒的新见解由Kaang Bong-Kiun领导的研究团队，基础科学研究所（IBS）内的认知与社会性中心主任，Kyung Hee大学牙科学院的教授Ko Hyoung-Gon发现了神经机制的神经机制，这些神经机制是疼痛和伊斯兰治疗的止痛药（ACP）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/Study-provides-new-insights-into-how-the-brain-distinguishes-between-pain-and-itch.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/Study-provides-new-insights-into-how-the-brain-distinguishes-between-pain-and-itch.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54B4AD24-70CB-48CA-B68A-DD2CB89637B8 Tue, 04 Mar 2025 06:13:44 -0500 Study provides new insights into how the brain distinguishes between pain and itch
AI成功减少了肺癌筛查中的工作量利物浦大学研究人员和荷兰诊断准确性研究所的一项新研究表明，人工智能（AI）可以显着提高肺癌筛查的效率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/ai-successcess--reduces-workload-in-lung-cancer-screening.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/ai-successcess--reduces-workload-in-lung-cancer-screening.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f6290A8C-BA9E-4926-9B78-DC3D8089A938 Tue, 04 Mar 2025 05:53:00 -0500 AI successfully reduces workload in lung cancer screening
FDA批准成人急性缺血性中风中Genentech的TNKase® Roche Group成员Genentech今天宣布，美国食品药品监督管理局（FDA）已批准了成人急性缺血性中风（AIS）的溶栓或凝块溶解剂TNKase®（Tenecteplase）（Tenecteplase）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/fda-approves-genenteche28099s-tnkasec2ae-in-in-ucute-utute-ute-ute-ute-ute in-Adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/fda-approves-genenteche28099s-tnkasec2ae-in-in-ut-1--in-ut-utiute-Ischemic-ischemic-schemic-stroke-stroke-in-Adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d06e8bae-5282-43AB-8C8D-79923142F575 Tue, 04 Mar 2025 05:42:00 -0500 FDA approves Genentech’s TNKase® in acute ischemic stroke in adults
令人惊讶的研究表明，爸爸的体重和饮食不会影响婴儿的大小一项研究表明，诸如BMI和饮食之类的父亲健康因素不会影响出生体重或长度，这强调了产妇饮食在怀孕中的关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/surprisising-study-reveals-dadse28099-weight-and-deight-and-diet-dote28099t-done28099t-impact-impact-babye28099s-size.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/surprising-study-reveals-dadse28099-weight-and-deight-and-diet-doin28099t-done28099t-impact-impact-babye28099s-size.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3dca525e-1f60-44A5-AD7B-6623D9F0EDA8 Tue, 04 Mar 2025 05:11:00 -0500 Surprising study reveals dads’ weight and diet don’t impact baby’s size
连续葡萄糖监测器的准确性如何？一项研究使他们接受了测试与毛细血管血糖测量相比，连续的葡萄糖监测器始终高估了禁食和光后血糖水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/how-accurate-are-colate-continuule-glucose-monitors-a-study-puts-puts-puts-them-them-the-the-the-pest.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/how-accurate-are-colate-continuule-glucose-monitors-a-study-puts-puts-puts-puts-them-them-the-the-pest.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6A0AF63B-CD43-49BA-91EA-DC92298D715B Tue, 04 Mar 2025 03:54:00 -0500 How accurate are continuous glucose monitors? A study puts them to the test
新的基于CRISPR的测试增强了威胁生命真菌感染的诊断杜兰大学的研究人员已经开发了一项基于CRISPR的测试，该测试诊断了肺炎胸藻Jirovecii肺炎（PJP） - 一种威胁生命的真菌感染，主要影响儿童和免疫受损的患者 - 据此发表在《临床研究杂志》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/New-CRISPR-based-test-enhances-diagnosis-of-life-threatening-fungal-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/New-CRISPR-based-test-enhances-diagnosis-of-life-threatening-fungal-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f9f0e18-562a-49cc-928E-3E9596B7BBB7 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 23:27:45 -0500 New CRISPR-based test enhances diagnosis of life-threatening fungal infection
